text: María Daniela Cepeda Matamoros (born 8 April 1996) is an Ecuadorian model and beauty queen who won the Miss Teen Earth 2015 held in Panama and two years later was crowned Miss Ecuador 2017 representing Ecuador at Miss Universe 2017. ==Personal life== Daniela is from Guayas and loves to travel, go to theatre and enjoys sports like cycling. She has studied Psychopedagogy from Casa Grande University. ==Pageantry== ===Miss Teen Ecuador 2015=== Daniela was crowned Miss Teen Ecuador International 2015 in Guayaquil and she represented Ecuador in the Miss Teen Earth pageant held in Panama. ===Miss Ecuador 2017=== Daniela was crowned Miss Ecuador 2017 on April 22, 2017 at El Chorrillo Complex, Babahoyo, Los Ríos and she competed at Miss Universe 2017 pageant but Unplaced. ===Miss Universe 2017=== Daniela represented her country at the Miss Universe 2017 in Las Vegas. ==References== ==External links== *Official Miss Ecuador website Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Guayaquil Category:Ecuadorian female models Category:Ecuadorian beauty pageant winners Category:Miss Universe 2017 contestants
title: Daniela Cepeda
